coreQueryPageProvider.name: SAVED_SEARCHES_ALL
coreQueryPageProvider.pattern: SELECT * FROM Document WHERE (ecm:mixinType = 'ParameterizedSavedSearch' OR (ecm:mixinType = 'SavedSearch' AND cvd:contentViewName IS NOT NULL)) AND ecm:isProxy = 0 AND ecm:isCheckedInVersion = 0 AND ecm:currentLifeCycleState != 'deleted'

coreQueryPageProvider.name: SAVED_SEARCHES_ALL_PAGE_PROVIDER
coreQueryPageProvider.pattern: SELECT * FROM Document WHERE ecm:isProxy = 0 AND ecm:isCheckedInVersion = 0 AND ecm:currentLifeCycleState != 'deleted' AND ((ecm:mixinType = 'ParameterizedSavedSearch' AND ss:search_type = 'pageProvider' AND ss:lang_or_provider_name = :pageProvider) OR (ecm:mixinType = 'SavedSearch' AND cvd:contentViewName IS NOT NULL))
